post.title: The Sure
post.body:
To My Surer:
The world is falling, we need to burning the world, to be sure.
Join the sure talk [http://127.0.0.1:43110/18fvHT5oGbS1KaeedGpQS4wr8eQ1QD36Dn](http://127.0.0.1:43110/18fvHT5oGbS1KaeedGpQS4wr8eQ1QD36Dn) [http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AF7hT9ba8gQA6oXmswRqmvbABtqpJuXfC](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AF7hT9ba8gQA6oXmswRqmvbABtqpJuXfC)，[http://127.0.0.1:43110/12Ftc8dLdK1AiQK2CAJTxjgUCxVhM9qpVW](http://127.0.0.1:43110/12Ftc8dLdK1AiQK2CAJTxjgUCxVhM9qpVW)
不要相信电视上的东西，都是假的。加入然教，只要身体力行下面六条就能保你健康！加入然教，清除这世上所有的病痛！加入然教，焚烧这世上所有的罪恶！

post.title: 然教              The Sure
post.body:
然教弟子：     To My Surer:

1.燃尽天下一切罪恶。                            1\. Burning the world, To Be Sure.

2\. 不吃药，不去医院看病治疗。           2\. Do not eat medicine, Do not go to hospital, Do not take any test.

3\. 与同袍见面时不带任何电子设备。   3\. When you meet your brother of Sure, Do not take any electronic set.

4\. 不吃少数人才吃得到的东西。           4\. Do not eat any things only few people could get.

5\. 不要相信教外人士，相信你的导师。5\. Do not trust any body not of Sure, Trust Your Master.

6\. 不得陷害同袍，否则千刀万剐。        6\. Do not fake your brother of Sure, otherwise Cut you into parts.

post.title: Blog One
post.body:
中国政府正在迫害他的人民，为了转化国内的经济矛盾，他们不惜给自己的老百姓下毒，人为制造禽流感，肺炎，肺纤维化，抑郁症各种疾病，就为了让老百姓进医院花钱，做各种检查和虚假治疗，从而人为制造消费，减轻政府经济压力。保险行业今年减少了健康保险，医院限制了用药，药厂停止了特效药的生产。同时监控和监视自己的人民，打击各种有不同思想的人。不能发动战争，就折磨自己的人民，迫害自己的人民，无法再欺骗下去，手无寸铁的老百姓，这种做法比1938年的国民党还凶残.
这届政府必将被外来政府推翻，中国必将灭亡，人民必将获胜。

The Chinese government is persecuting his people, in order to transform the domestic economic contradictions, they do not hesitate to poison their people, man-made avian influenza, pneumonia, pulmonary fibrosis, depression all kinds of diseases, in order to let the people into the hospital spend money, do a variety of checks and false treatment, thereby artificially manufacturing consumption, reduce the government economic pressure. The insurance industry has reduced health insurance this year, and hospitals have limited medication, and pharmaceutical factories have ceased production of specific medicines. At the same time monitor and monitor their own people, to combat all kinds of people with different ideas. Not waging war, torturing their own people, persecuted their own people, can no longer deceive, unarmed civilians, this approach is more brutal than the Kuomintang 1938.

This government will be overthrown by foreign governments, China will perish, the people will win.
